desc: Can be used to craft traps and weapons.
A trap with acorn as a bait. Enemies get damage when walk onto it. Crafted from branch and acorn.
textWhenFirstMeet: 1:A trap! You can use it to chase away other animals by moving them on top of it.

desc: Enemy. Walks to player, deals damage equals its hit points.
textWhenFirstMeet: 1:a sneaky weasel! Try not get close to it as it might bite you!

desc: Enemy. When chased away, would left an item on the ground.
Enemy. When there are 2 or more traps and weapons around, would fly away.

textWhenFirstMeet: 1:a sneaky fox! It would attack every 4 rounds so chase it away before that!

desc: Deals damage to enemies around it.

textWhenFirstMeet: 1:You heard a low growl deep in the forest|3:The growl getting closer and closer…
1:nuts on the tree! Try hit them to the ground and collect them! You can stack them on the ground.

desc: A friendly hedgehog, enemy would walk to and attack him too. Keep him alive if you can!
A weapon that would exchange position with enemy before attack
Enemy. When swap, reduces the other one's hit points by half.
Enemy. Heal other enemies before attack.
Enemy. Would steal food around and heal itself before attack.
Weapon. Taste good. If didn't kill enemy, would heal it instead.
A candy made with hawthorn. Enemies would get attract to it as it is a player. Enemies get damage when walk onto it. Crafted from branch and hawthorn.
Edible, heals player when eaten. Sweet and sour and smells good.
A weapon that would attack all enemy on that direction.
Trap. Deals damage to 3x3 enemies around it.
A friendly Blaumeise. Keep him alive if you can!
